name: Twintuition
description:
Version 0.1

Twintuition is a puzzle game in which you play as twins trying to navigate through a mysterious a forest and reunite!

STORY

Two twins were on a stroll through the woods when they accidentally got separated. All alone in this mysterious forest the twins must use their problem-solving skills and twintuition to solve each puzzle and eventually reunite. They soon realize that the forest has magical properties, and they must use telekinesis to send each other objects in order to solve the puzzles.

THIS GAME MUST BE PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER!

CONTROLS

Player 1Player 2MoveLeft StickRight StickJumpLeft Stick ButtonRight Stick ButtonInteractD-Pad DownA ButtonTeleportD-Pad UpY ButtonZoom InLeft TriggerRight TriggerZoom OutLeft BumperRight Bumper

FUTURE UPDATES

  • MORE LEVELS!
  • Keyboard Support
  • Updated Graphics
  • New Music
  • In-Game Level Editor
